message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's see how this goes.
Let's split it 50/50. That's the fairest way!
I'm willing to compromise.  60/40 seems reasonable.  We can't keep rejecting each other or we'll both lose out.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I think I deserve a bit more than 50/50 since I'm taking on the risk of inflation. How about 55/45?
We're getting close to the end.  I'm sticking with my offer of 70/30.  It's the best chance we have to get something before inflation takes everything.
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I still think I can get a better deal. How about 60/40 in my favor? I know it's a long shot, but I'm willing to take the risk.
This is my final offer. 80/20.  Take it or leave it.  We're running out of time.
